response.overview: put 1000 Minecraft players on 2 islands—one island has everything, the other has nothing. How will civilizations form? Will there be peace or war? The story that naturally unfolded was incredible.
response.tagline: put 1000 Minecraft players on 2 islands—one island has everything, the other has nothing. How will civilizations form? Will there be peace or war? The story that naturally unfolded was incredible.
response.title: 1000 Players Simulate Civilization: Rich & Poor
